examples.korean: The treaty was signed on 24 March. 발음듣기 그 조약은 3월 24일에 조인되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The treaty was signed on 24 March. 발음

examples.korean: The agreement was signed during a meeting at the UN. 발음듣기 그 협정은 유엔 회의에서 조인되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The agreement was signed during a meeting at the UN. 발음

examples.korean: They are demanding certain guarantees before they sign the treaty. 발음듣기 그들은 그 조약에 조인하기 전에 어떤 확약들을 요구하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They are demanding certain guarantees before they sign the treaty. 발음

examples.korean: the signing of the Treaty of Rome 발음듣기 로마 조약 조인 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the signing of the Treaty of Rome 발음

examples.korean: to issue/sign a declaration 발음듣기 선언문을 발표하다/선언서에 조인하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
